Serialized Form

  • Package main

    • Class main.GraphicLauncher

      class GraphicLauncher extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • actualCitizen
          Man actualCitizen
          Its used to show the actualCitizen info on the log.
        • actualCitizenID
          int actualCitizenID
          Set to 1 at the start of the game.
        • actualCitizenInfoText
          JTextArea actualCitizenInfoText
          The JTextArea where to show the selected citizen info
        • actualTurn
          main.GraphicLauncher.QuantityTurns actualTurn
          This variable is used to write the actual turn on the log.
        • animalList
          AnimalList animalList
          Used to store the animals of the map.
        • biomeGenerator
          BiomeGenerator biomeGenerator
          Used on the initialize() method to generate new biomes.
        • board
          Board board
          Store the map and all the objects of the game.
        • citizenList
          CitizenList citizenList
          Used to store the citizens of the map.
        • controlMusicChanger
          boolean controlMusicChanger
          Used on the controlMusic() method to know if its time to mute or unmute the audio.
        • generatingTurns
          AtomicBoolean generatingTurns
          Used on the SwingWorkerGenerateTurns class to know how much turns remain.
        • height
          int height
          Height of the board. Set on the constructor.
        • log
          ActionsLog log
          Used to store all the actions and later show the text on the logTextArea.
        • logTextArea
          JTextArea logTextArea
          The JTextArea where to show the log String
        • mainContentPane
          JPanel mainContentPane
          The main frame of the program window
        • musicController
          FloatControl musicController
          Used on the controlMusic() method to know the song to wich change the volume.
        • payOrTax
          AtomicBoolean payOrTax
          Used on the generateOneTurn() method each 200 turns to know if its time to pay or collect taxes.
        • programInUse
          AtomicBoolean programInUse
          The variable programInUse is used on generateXturns() to prevent the player use other buttons during the performance of the method.
        • resourcesList
          ResourcesList resourcesList
          Used to store the resources of the map.
        • textCentralArea
          JTextArea textCentralArea
          The JTextArea where to draw the map
        • timeBetweenTurns
          int timeBetweenTurns
          Time on ms between turns. Set on the constructor.
        • turnsValueTextField
          JTextField turnsValueTextField
          The JTextField where write the amount value for a random generated turns
        • turnX
          main.GraphicLauncher.QuantityTurns turnX
          Used on the SwingWorkerGenerateTurns class to know how much turns are have been requested to generate.
        • width
          int width
          Width of the board. Set on the constructor.
